summary: The silent routine of 5 Nuns living in the West Bank wilderness is disturbed when an Israeli settler family breaks down right outside the convent just as the Sabbath comes into effect.
cast: Maria Zreik|Huda Al Imam|Shady Srour|Ruth Farhi|Maya Koren|Sana Tanous|Maria De Pina|Raneen Bisharat Iskandar
title: Ave Maria
